title: 86/395/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 July 1986 amending Decision 86/192/EEC concerning animal health conditions and veterinary certification for imports of fresh meat from Uruguay
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 25 July 1986
amending Decision 86/192/EEC concerning animal helath conditions and veterinary certification for imports of fresh meat from Uruguay
(86/395/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 5 of Decision 86/192/EEC is hereby replaced by the following:
'Article 5
This Decision shall apply with effect from 1 April 1986. However the certificate currently used, amended if necessary in accordance with the provisions of this Decision, may be used until 31 August 1986.'
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
